Infectra


*Infectra sighs and looks around*


Infectra:  "I guess we shoul=
d go back to base."

*Infectra says to Airbomber*

  ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, August 1=
3, 2000 2:28 AM
  Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


  Airbomber sigh=
s and starts to fall asleep from boredom...

    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

 August 13, 2000 1:18 AM

    I=
nfectra


    Infectra:  "Hmm....There are only two of us and there could b=
e many of them. I'm not sure."


    *Infectra says to Airbomber*

      --=
--- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
      Sent: Sunday, August 13, 2000 1:12 AM
      Subject: Re: Airbombe=
r and Infectra...


      Airbomber honestly didn't know where to go.

    =
  "Want to attack a base?" Airbomber asked Infectra...
        ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups=
.com 
        Sent: Saturday, August 12, 2000 8:50 PM
        Subject: Re: =
Airbomber and Infectra...


        Infectra

         
         
        *=
Infectra begins walking while looking around herself*

        Infectra:  "=
Are we going in any place particular?"

        *Infectra asks Airbomber*

=
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, August 12, 2000 7:05 PM
 =
         Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


          Airbomber took =
Infectra's hand and started to walk...
            ----- Original Message -=
---- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
            Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 10:21 PM
            Subject: R=
e: Airbomber and Infectra...


            Infectra


            Infectra:=
 "I don't know, I guess he just doesn't want to come.."


            *Infe=
ctra says to Airbomber while frowning*
              ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
              From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
              Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 10:11 PM
              Subject:=
 Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


              "Okay. Hey, Stranato!" Airbo=
mber called.

              "Go away! Having fun with friends!" Stranato ca=
lled out.

              "I thought we were his friends." Airbomber said sa=
dly...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: =
ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Se=
nt: Friday, August 11, 2000 9:55 PM
                Subject: Re: Airbomber =
w/ Infectra...


                Infectra

                *Infectra leaves=
 the base and stands next to Airbomber and starts thinking*


             =
   Infectra: "Umm...Should we see if anyone else wants to go with us?"

   =
             *Infectra asks Airbomber with a smile*

                  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
                =
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 9=
:38 PM
                  Subject: Re: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


          =
        Airbomber left the base and looked off into the distance. He starte=
d to feel bad about this, they didn't have any friends to help them if they=
 got into trouble...
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
                From: ilovealllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
                    Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 8:36 PM
         =
           Subject: Re: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


                    Infe=
ctra

                    *Infectra smiles*

                    Infectra: =
"Indeed, we shall be off."

                    *Infectra says to Airbomber=
 as she opens the door leading out of their room*

                      --=
--- Original Message ----- 
                      From: THECODE 
          =
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Friday, Aug=
ust 11, 2000 6:40 PM
                      Subject: Re: Airbomber w/ Infect=
ra...


                      Airbomber takes her hand.

                  =
    "We can make the Maximals proud." Airbomber said...
                   =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
                        From: iloveallli=
zards 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    =
    Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 4:24 AM
                        Subject: =
Re: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


                        Infectra


         =
               Infectra: "Hmm...Sounds good to me."

                      =
  *Infectra stands up*

                        Infectra: "Shall we?"

    =
                    *Infectra says to Airbomber smiling holding her hand ou=
t*

                          ----- Original Message ----- 
               =
           From: THECODE 
                          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

                          Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 3:29 AM
          =
                Subject: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


                       =
   "So, want to gop outside or something? See the world, capture out first =
Preds?" Airbomber asked Infectra. He lenaed over and kissed her...
